alert.note: Alert for Garfield (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 27 at 2:29PM MDT until August 27 at 2:45PM MDT by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 245 PM MDT FOR SOUTH CENTRAL GARFIELD COUNTY... At 229 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 15 miles northwest of De Beque, or 29 miles north of Grand Junction, and is nearly stationary. HAZARD...Quarter size hail and very heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of south central Garfield County. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
